'''Character EXP Materials''' are [[Character Development Item]]s with [[Character EXP]] used to level [[character]]s.

==Types==
The three following materials can be used to give a character experience, and every 5 points of EXP costs 1 [[Mora]].
{{Card|Wanderer's Advice|1,000EXP|show_caption=1|stars=1|caption_width=85px}}
{{Card|Adventurer's Experience|5,000EXP|show_caption=1|stars=1|caption_width=85px}}
{{Card|Hero's Wit|20,000EXP|show_caption=1|stars=1|caption_width=85px}}
